name: 王子建
objective: Material properties (Si and GaAs), Crystal growth, Crystal Doping, Epitaxy (MBE, VPE, LPE), Film deposition (thermal evaporation, e-gun, sputtering), Thermal diffusion, Ion implantation
schedule:
Week 1 - course introduction
Week 2 - material properties (Si and GaAs): crystal structure, orientation effect
Week 3 - material defects and their electronic properties
Week 4 - crystal growth technique
Week 5 - crystal doping technique
Week 6 - zone process 
Week 7 - epitaxy theory
Week 8 - MBE, VPE(1/2)
Week 9 - midterm report
Week 10 - VPE (2/2), LPE
Week 11 - film deposition
Week 12 - film characteristics (1/2)
Week 13 - film characteristics (2/2)
Week 14 - diffusion (1/2)
Week 15 - diffusion (2/2)
Week 16 - implantation (1/2)
Week 17 - implantation (2/2)
Week 18 - final exam
scorePolicy:
midterm report 40%
final exam 40%
homework and regular assessment 20%
materials:
1. Sorab K. Ghandhi, VLSI Fabrication Principles: Silicon and Gallium Arsenide, Wiley Interscience.
2. V. Swaminathan and A. T. Macrander, Materials Aspects of GaAs and InP Base Structure, Prentice Hall.
3. Ralph Williams, Modern GaAs Processing Methods, Artech House
